directions: Bring sugar and water to a boil in a small saucepan, stirring until sugar has dissolved, then transfer to a bowl and cool syrup completely (or quick-chill by setting bowl in an ice bath and stirring occasionally until cool).
Stir together juices, wine, Cognac, mint, fruit, and cooled syrup in a large pitcher. Chill, covered, until cold, about 1 hour. Stir in Champagne.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups fresh grapefruit juice (preferably pink or ruby red)
1 (750-ml) bottle Champagne or other sparkling white wine, chilled
title: Champagne Punch
